meanings.definition: A person or animal that yowls loudly.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood yowlers kept everyone awake at night.
meanings.sent2: The yowlers in the forest could be heard for miles.
meanings.sent3: The yowlers outside sounded like a choir of cats.
meanings.sent4: The yowlers in the distance echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The yowlers' howls pierced the silence of the night.

meanings.sent1: The yowlers of the wolves signaled the start of the hunt.
meanings.sent2: The yowlers of the sirens filled the air with noise.
meanings.sent3: The yowlers at the concert made the audience cover their ears.
meanings.sent4: The yowlers of the wind outside made the windows rattle.
meanings.sent5: The yowlers of the thunderstorm drowned out all other sounds.
